org.testng.reporters

Class FailedReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testng.TestListenerAdapter
      • org.testng.reporters.FailedReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationListener, IConfigurationListener2, IResultListener, IResultListener2, IReporter, ITestListener, ITestNGListener

    public class FailedReporter
extends TestListenerAdapter
implements IReporter
    This reporter is responsible for creating testng-failed.xml
